info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Will, southern Grundy and west central Kankakee Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gardner, or near Dwight, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Braidwood, Wilmington, Coal City, Dwight, Diamond, Gardner, Lakewood Shores, Mazon, Braceville, Essex, South Wilmington, Godley, Bonfield, Carbon Hill, Verona, East Brooklyn and Union Hill. Including the following interstate... I-55 between mile markers 219 and 244. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Illinois.
